name: Duration

aliases.name: Model
aliases.type: { elapsed : Maybe.Maybe ( Time.Time, Duration.Direction ) , onCompletion : Platform.Cmd.Cmd b }

types.name: Msg
types.comment:
Either trigger the transition to explicitly go `Forward`, `Reverse`,
    or `Toggle` its playback, where `b` is the effect to be played when
    the transition finishes.

values.name: init
values.comment: The initial state of the duration

values.name: subscriptions
values.comment: The subscriptions for the duration - every time the browser screen refreshes.

values.name: update
values.comment:
Given a time-indexed command and the length of time the animation
    should play over, create an update function.
values.type: (Time.Time -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd a) -> Time.Time -> Duration.Msg b -> Duration.Model b -> ( Duration.Model b, Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Result.Result a b) )
